description:
==============================================================================

This is a snnipet to connect to some Intelipost webservices and make easier your integration.

Intelipost is a technology & consulting company based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil that offers a Logistics Gateway API and provides SAAS to many e-commerce webshops that are willing to optimize their logistics overall costs.

Intelipost connects your webshop to all main brazilian logistics providers and supports most used ERP solutions.

The main features intelipost offers for your business:
+ Freight comparison using our proprietary algorithm
+ Daily updates of freight costs, delivery time & addresses
+ Custom tracking page of your webshop
+ Automatic Correios refund in case of delays (brazilian postal company)
+ BI Reports
+ And more!
The major benefits:
+ Activate new logistics providers easily
+ Measure the Quality Score of each provider
+ Cost reduction from 5%- 40% in shipping costs p. order
+ Reduce IT dev & maintenance costs
+ And more!
Interested, but still have some doubts?

Access our documentation available at our official technical wiki (https://docs.intelipost.com.br) or at Github (https://github.com/intelipost).

==============================================================================
summary: Intelipost is a simple, fast and secure shipping and logistics gateway API. You can sign up for an account at http://www.intelipost.com.br.
title: InteliPost API
